QuestData.Title: Pirate Accuracy Increasing
QuestData.Description: I don't know if you've noticed, but the cannonballs are hitting us. I'd say the Southsea pirates are getting more accurate... the ship is on fire!$B$BYou've got a river boat now. Go talk to Mazzer Stripscrew.$B$BPut those fires out!
QuestData.LogDescription: Get a River Boat from Mazzer Stripscrew and then use the Frost Cannon to extinguish 15 fires.
QuestData.RewardText: One problem down. Now to deal with the greater threat!
